00027 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoSubNode.h>
00028 
00029 class SoGroupP;
00030 
00031 class COIN_DLL_API SoGroup : public SoNode {
00032   typedef SoNode inherited;
00033 
00034   SO_NODE_HEADER(SoGroup);
00035 
00036 public:
00037   enum SoGroupChangedType {
00038     GROUP_UNSPECIFIED,
00039     GROUP_NO_GROUP,
00040     GROUP_ADDCHILD,
00041     GROUP_INSERTCHILD,
00042     GROUP_REPLACECHILD,
00043     GROUP_REMOVECHILD,
00044     GROUP_REMOVEALLCHILDREN
00045   };
00046 
00047   static void initClass(void);
00048   SoGroup(void);
00049 
00050   SoGroup(int nchildren);
00051  
00052   virtual void addChild(SoNode * node);
00053   virtual void insertChild(SoNode * child, int newchildindex);
00054   virtual SoNode * getChild(int index) const;
00055   virtual SoNode * getChangedChild(void) const;
00056   virtual int findChild(const SoNode * node) const;
00057   virtual int getNumChildren(void) const;
00058   virtual int getChangedIndex(void) const;
00059   virtual SoGroupChangedType getChangedType(void) const;
00060   virtual void removeChild(int childindex);
00061   virtual void removeChild(SoNode * child);
00062   virtual void removeAllChildren(void);
00063   virtual void replaceChild(int index, SoNode * newchild);
00064   virtual void replaceChild(SoNode * oldchild, SoNode * newchild);
00065 
00066   virtual void doAction(SoAction * action);
00067   virtual void GLRender(SoGLRenderAction * action);
00068   virtual void callback(SoCallbackAction * action);
00069   virtual void getBoundingBox(SoGetBoundingBoxAction * action);
00070   virtual void getMatrix(SoGetMatrixAction * action);
00071   virtual void handleEvent(SoHandleEventAction * action);
00072   virtual void pick(SoPickAction * action);
00073   virtual void search(SoSearchAction * action);
00074   virtual void write(SoWriteAction * action);
00075   virtual void getPrimitiveCount(SoGetPrimitiveCountAction * action);
00076   virtual void audioRender(SoAudioRenderAction * action);
00077   virtual SoChildList * getChildren(void) const;
00078 
00079 protected:
00080   virtual ~SoGroup();
00081 
00082   virtual SbBool readInstance(SoInput * in, unsigned short flags);
00083   virtual SbBool readChildren(SoInput * in);
00084 
00085   virtual void copyContents(const SoFieldContainer * from,
00086                             SbBool copyconnections);
00087   virtual void resetChangedStatus(void);
00088 
00089   SoChildList * children;
00090   SoNode * changedChild;
00091   SoGroupChangedType changedType;
00092   int changedIndex;
00093 
00094 private:
00095   friend class SoUnknownNode; // Let SoUnknownNode access readChildren().
00096   SoGroupP * pimpl;
00097 };
